DataElement.preferredName: Protocol Device Manufacturer Adverse Event Report Submission Date
DataElement.preferredDefinition: Submission of expedited notification that a subject has experienced an adverse event to the Food and Drug Administration (FDA)._Manufacturer means any person who manufactures, prepares, propagates, compounds, assembles, or processes a device by chemical, physical, biological, or other procedure._A therapeutic agent (drug, intervention therapy) used in a clinical trial protocol._the date on which an observation was made or an event occurred.

DataElementConcept.preferredName: Protocol Agent Manufacturer Adverse Event Reporting Submission
DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: Submission of expedited notification that a subject has experienced an adverse event to the Food and Drug Administration (FDA)._Manufacturer means any person who manufactures, prepares, propagates, compounds, assembles, or processes a device by chemical, physical, biological, or other procedure._A therapeutic agent (drug, intervention therapy) used in a clinical trial protocol.

ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: A therapeutic agent (drug, intervention therapy) used in a clinical trial protocol.:Manufacturer Name; the name of a business engaged in manufacturing some product

Concepts.definition: A medical product, practice, or application that is tested in a clinical trial.
A person, enterprise, or entity that produces finished goods.

Property.preferredName: Adverse Drug Experience Reporting System Submission
Property.preferredDefinition: A Web application developed for the electronic submission of Expedited Reports to the NCI for serious and/or unexpected Adverse Events, deaths, and other events defined in the NCI Guidelines: Adverse Event Reporting Requirements for NCI Investigational Agents:Submission; a message submitted for the judgment of others.

Concepts.definition: A Web application developed for the electronic submission of Expedited Reports to the NCI for serious and/or unexpected Adverse Events, deaths, and other events defined in the NCI Guidelines: Adverse Event Reporting Requirements for NCI Investigational Agents
Something submitted for the judgment or consideration of others.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition:
any unfavorable symptoms, signs, or disease temporally associated with the use of a medical
treatment or procedure that may or may not be considered related to the medical
treatment or procedure.

ValueDomain.preferredDefinition: The date on which an observation was made or an event occurred.

RepresentationTerm.preferredDefinition: a particular day specified as the time something has, or will, happen.

Concepts.definition: The particular day, month and year an event has happened or will happen.
